entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain or ice pellets beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers late this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 120 along parts of the coast late this morning and this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning this evening and ending overnight then 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 120 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023
